document.description: 5min's Diet & Nutrition category offers you a variety of free how-to videos on Diet & Nutrition, including DIY tips, advice and useful tutorials.
document.body:
| Learn how to maintain your diet and nutrition, feel and look great Home Videos Studios Upload About Solutions Got 5min? Login / Join now How to videos > Health > Diet&Nutrition in Diet&Nutrition All in Arts in Auto in Business in Entertainment in Extreme in Fashion in Fitness in Food in Games in Health in Home in Knowledge in Life Tips in Music in News in Parenting in People in Pets in Spiritual in Sports in Tech in Travel in Video Games Health ADHD AIDS&HIV Allergies Alternative Alzheimer Arthritis Asthma Autism Cholesterol Cold&Flu Conditions&Illnesses Dental Health Dermatology Diabetes Diet&Nutrition Digestive Disorders Eye Health First Aid General Health Heart Disease Lung Health Massage Mental Health Neurology Oncology&Cancer Orthopedics Pain Management Pediatrics Plastic Surgery Self Exams Sexual Health Sleep Disorders Substance Abuse Swine Flu Urology Women's Health Others Arts Auto Business Entertainment Extreme Fashion Fitness Food Games Home Knowledge Life Tips Music News Parenting People Pets Spiritual Sports Tech Travel Video Games Featured | Most Viewed | Top Rated | Most Discussed | Recently Added Today This Week This Month Ever Diet&Nutrition Highlights What Prevents a Senior from Good Nutrition New York Diet and Nutrition Tips The Nutritional Power of Purple Foods You've Got Vegan Food's Benefits Diet&Nutrition | 1 - 15 out of 3876 videos 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 ... 259 Next Healthy Fast Food Choices In this video, registered Dietitian Sonya Kaster describes ways to incorporate healthy choices when eating at a fast food restaurant. This video is designed for adults. This video illustrates strategies, portion control, food safety and healthy items to choose when eating at a fast food restaurant. 4:52 By: MonkeySee.c... In: Health Rating:0 Views: 79,364 Added More than a year ago The Benefits of Chocolate Milk as a Sports Drink To refuel your body after a workout, try drinking a glass of low-fat chocolate milk. This beverage has what most sports drinks lack: Protein, vitamin D and vitamin B. 3:21 By: TheDoctors In: Health Rating:0 Views: 1,367 Added More than a year ago How to Choose a Healthy Snack Bar This energy bar is loaded with real fruit and has no added sugar. 1:11 By: Prevention In: Health Rating:0 Views: 102,144 Added More than a year ago Which Healing Foods Balance Hormones Dr. Maoshing discusses which healthy foods help to balance hormones. 6:19 By: empowher In: Health Rating:0 Views: 771 Added 11 months ago Foods That Can Burn Fat Fitness expert John Basedow discuses a few foods that help you burn fat. 1:36 By: MonkeySee.c... In: Health Rating:0 Views: 62,007 Added 5 months ago Human Chorionic Gonadotropin for Weight Loss Dr. Kent Holtorf explains what human chorionic gonadotropin or HCG is, stating that it is a hormone that women produce while they're pregnant, and is used to increase progesterone for the baby. 0:58 By: HuffPost... In: Health Rating:0 Views: 36,610 Added More than a year ago Tips for Keeping Good Cholesterol in Check Leading Cardiologist Carl Lavie shares latest research on cholesterol lowering treatments and tips on how to keep your heart healthy. 3:17 By: LifeMinute.tv In: Health Rating:0 Views: 5,183 Added 1 month ago Research Says We Underestimate Our Weight from an Early Age In this edition of EmpowHER's"HER Daily Dose", Bailey Mosier examines a study that says that we begin underestimating our weight at an early age. 1:15 By: empowher In: News Rating:0 Views: 169 Added 2 months ago What Are the Dangers of Eating Bread, Rice and Pasta Dr. Bowden discusses the dangers related to eating bread, rice and pasta. 1:39 By: empowher In: Health Rating:0 Views: 602 Added 11 months ago Symptoms of a Low Thyroid Dr. Kent Holtorf describes the symptoms of low thyroid to be fatigue, depression, inability to loose weight, and cold hands and feet, and that these symptoms will not be detected in a standard blood test. 0:49 By: HuffPost... In: Health Rating:0 Views: 11,458 Added More than a year ago How Vitamin D Contributes to a Woman's Health Dr. Weil explains how vitamin D contributes to a woman's health. 1:55 By: empowher In: Health Rating:0 Views: 76,695 Added 11 months ago How My Thyroid Relates to My Metabolism Dr. Kent Holtorf discusses how thyroid is related to your metabolism, stating that thyroid is what initiates metabolism and low thyroid levels can hamper your body metabolism functions. 0:56 By: HuffPost... In: Health Rating:0 Views: 7,516 Added More than a year ago Reserch Supports Eating Fruit for a Better Complexion In this edition of EmpowHER's"HER Week In Health", Bailey Mosier discovers a simple way to make your complexion look healthier, why two heads are not always better than one, and a simple way to give your kids a leg up in math and science. 2:36 By: empowher In: News Rating:0 Views: 2,770 Added 2 months ago David Chang on Eating Better David Chang, chef and owner of the Momofuku Restaurants, shares his thoughts on whether we can eat better. He also talks about whether greenmarkets are enough and what else is needed. 1:41 By: BigThink In: Food Rating:0 Views: 79,928 Added More than a year ago Nutritional Information Legally Compliant But Not Consumer Friendly In this edition of EmpowHER's,"HER Daily Dose", Bailey Mosier discusses a study that finds that although Nutritional Information labels are legally compliant they are not very consumer friendly. 1:11 By: empowher In: News Rating:0 Views: 278 Added 2 months ago 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 ... 259 Next Add Diet&Nutrition videos to your site with ThumbSeed Get the best in Diet&Nutrition with our Editorially Featured videos Studio Picks in Diet&Nutrition HealthScienceChannel Videos Shared: 349 Member Since: 1/26/10 Prevention Videos Shared: 638 Member Since: 12/1/09 HealthCentral Videos Shared: 185 Member Since: 4/22/09 EmpowHER Videos Shared: 6,683 Member Since: 11/23/09 Bite Size Video Videos Shared: 14 Member Since: 9/24/08 The Doctors Videos Shared: 5,372 Member Since: 5/3/09 Prevention Videos Shared: 638 Member Since: 12/1/09 EmpowHER Videos Shared: 6,683 Member Since: 11/23/09 MonkeySee.com - Health Videos Shared: 1,740 Member Since: 6/30/09 Better.TV Videos Shared: 2,319 Member Since: 11/17/09 5min NewsFeed TheDoctors uploaded a video: New York Diet and Nutrition Tips, today.
